name: House Haunting
description: House Haunters is the story of you. As a not-so-friendly ghost, your one remaining unfinished business in the mortal plane is to protect your home. Now, with a realtor hosting an open house, it’s time to use everything around you to scare potential buyers out of your house. Prevent them from touring the rooms of your home by casting spells, breaking vases, and flashing lights. Don’t let them reach the realtor or it’s you who’ll be kicked out of the house!
